title: Mr Squiggle and Friends
creator_credit: ABC-TV (Australia), Julia Kalytis and Pam Verrall
brief_description: Mr. Squiggle and his friends have been entertaining Australian children for almost 30 years on ABC television. Now he lives in Bandywallop and is just as much fun as ever. This first video of Mr. Squiggle has all his favourite friends including Roxanne, sharing adventures with Bill and Gus, Merv Wallop and his nephew Wayne. Episodes include : “Squiggle”, “Settlers’ Week”, “The Knapsack”. Rated: G
